name: Literal If Otherwise Nil
csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
 <citation>
 <layout>
 <date variable="issued" prefix="(" suffix=")">
 <date-part name="month" form="long"/>
 <date-part name="day" suffix=", "/>
 <date-part name="year"/>
 </date>
 </layout>
 </citation>
</style>
